original_text: Because the people have forsaken me and have profaned this place by making offerings in it to other gods whom neither they nor their fathers nor the kings of Judah have known; and because they have filled this place with the blood of innocents,
korean_text: 이는 그들이 나를 버리고 이 곳을 불결하게 하며 이 곳에서 자기와 자기 조상들과 유다 왕들이 알지 못하던 다른 신들에게 분향하며 무죄한 자의 피로 이 곳에 채웠음이며

sentences.original_text: Because the people have forsaken me
by making offerings in it to other gods
whom neither they nor their fathers have known
nor the kings of Judah have known
and because they have filled this place
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 그들이 이 곳을 채운 것은
